items.name: Jesse Kanner
items.text: It was a real pleasure working with Sam… She is a triple threat: coder, designer, and project manager.

items.name: Chris Hajian
items.text: Samantha is a true professional in every sense. Her work ethic is unparalleled and I am truly grateful I found her.

items.name: Mark Danson
items.text: Integrity” is the word I would choose to describe Samantha both as a person and her approach to development.
